name: config-discovery
description: A simple JSON configuration loading and compositing utility.

scripts.test: ENV_VAL_ONE='value one from env.' ENV_VAL_TWO='value two from env.' ENV_VAL_THREE='value three from env.' c8 --reporter=lcov mocha test/test.js
